oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Will Rogers Memorial Fund, a lithograph by Howard Chandler Christy

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Large lithographic poster for the Will Rogers Memorial Fund. The artwork was done by Howard Chandler Christy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Lithographs; Memorial works
Broadsides; Rogers, Will, 1879-1935; Christy, Howard Chandler, 1873-1952; Lithography - 20th Century
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Howard Chandler Christy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Howard Chandler Christy (1873-1952) was an American artist famous for the "Christy Girl," similar to the "Gibson Girl." His illustrations appeared in Scribner's, Harper's, and Collier's Weekly magazines and in many books.
